## Type of Change
<!-- Mark the relevant option(s) with an 'x' -->

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Visual enhancement (styling, layout, or design improvement)
- [ ] Performance improvement
- [ ] Code refactoring (no functional changes)
- [ ] Accessibility improvement
- [ ] Mobile/responsive fix
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)

## Theme Compatibility

- [ ] Changes are compatible with parent theme (TheSource v4.8.13)
- [ ] No modifications made to parent theme files
- [ ] All customizations are in child theme
- [ ] WordPress version tested: ______

## Code Quality

- [ ] Code follows WordPress coding standards
- [ ] PHP syntax is valid (no errors)
- [ ] CSS is valid and follows BEM or existing naming conventions
- [ ] JavaScript (if any) is error-free
- [ ] No console errors or warnings
- [ ] Comments added for complex logic

## Performance & Accessibility

- [ ] Changes do not negatively impact page load time
- [ ] Images are optimized (if applicable)
- [ ] ARIA labels added where appropriate
- [ ] Keyboard navigation works correctly
- [ ] Color contrast meets WCAG AA standards

## Deployment Checklist

- [ ] Tested on staging environment
- [ ] Database changes documented (if any)
- [ ] Backup plan documented (if needed)
- [ ] Rollback procedure documented (if needed)

## Reviewer Checklist

- [ ] Visual review completed on desktop
- [ ] Visual review completed on mobile

- [ ] Documentation is accurate and complete
- [ ] Approved for deployment

## Post-Deployment
<!-- To be completed after deployment -->

- [ ] Changes verified on production
- [ ] No errors in browser console
- [ ] No PHP errors in server logs
- [ ] Monitoring for issues (24-48 hours)
